roleset.name: move in a circle or spiral, quickly

example.name: whirl-v: straight intransitive
example.text: They whirled and saw him, standing there dim in the slatted light from the boarded freight wall.

example.name: whirl-v: particle as axis
example.text: He whirled around, suddenly hot all over, finding the man who had been standing before him a few moments back, nailing him to thespot on which he now stood, open-mouthed.

example.name: whirl-v: not an axis
example.text: [A tune]-1 began [*-1]to whirl inside his head .
